====Readings====
* {{ja-readings|goon=[[よう]] (yō)|kanon=[[よう]] (yō)|kun=[[妖しい]] ([[あやしい|あや-しい]], ''[[ayashii|aya-shii]]''), [[およずれ]], ''[[oyozure]]'', [[妖めく]] ([[なまめく|なま-めく]], ''[[namameku|nama-meku]]''), [[妖い]] ([[わざわい|わざわ-い]], ''[[wazawai|wazawa-i]]'')}}

====Compounds====
{{der-top|Compounds}}
* {{l|ja|妖人}} ({{l|ja|およずれびと}}, ''[[oyozurebito]]''): a person who leads others [[astray]] with their words
* {{l|ja|妖異}} ({{l|ja|ようい}}, ''[[yōi]]''): something [[strange]] and [[mysterious]]; a [[monster]] or [[phantom]]
* {{l|ja|妖艶}}, {{l|ja|妖婉}} ({{l|ja|ようえん}}, ''[[yōen]]''): [[bewitchingly]] [[attractive]]; [[seductive]]
* {{l|ja|妖花}} ({{l|ja|ようか}}, ''[[yōka]]''): a [[strangely]] [[beautiful]] [[flower]]; metaphorically, a strangely beautiful woman
* {{l|ja|妖怪}} ({{l|ja|ようかい}}, ''[[yōkai]]''): a [[monster]], a [[phantom]]
* {{l|ja|妖気}} ({{l|ja|ようき}}, ''[[yōki]]''): a [[weird]] or [[unearthly]] [[feeling]]
* {{l|ja|妖姫}} ({{l|ja|ようき}}, ''[[yōki]]''): a [[seductively]] [[beautiful]] [[princess]], a [[distractingly]] [[attractive]] woman
* {{l|ja|妖狐}} ({{l|ja|ようこ}}, ''[[yōko]]''): a [[demon]] [[fox]] , [[kitsune]]
* {{l|ja|妖教}} ({{l|ja|ようきょう}}, ''[[yōkyō]]''): a [[religion]] that leads people [[astray]]; [[heresy]]
* {{l|ja|妖孽}} ({{l|ja|ようげつ}}, ''[[yōgetsu]]''): a [[strange]] [[calamity]]; an [[omen]] or [[portent]] of [[misfortune]]
* {{l|ja|妖言}} ({{l|ja|ようげん}}, ''[[yōgen]]'' / {{l|ja|およずれごと}}, ''[[oyozuregoto]]''): a [[malicious]] [[rumor]]
* {{l|ja|妖光}} ({{l|ja|ようこう}}, ''[[yōkō]]''): a [[strange]] and [[inauspicious]] [[light]]
* {{l|ja|妖術}} ({{l|ja|ようじゅつ}}, ''[[yōjutsu]]''): [[witchcraft]], [[sorcery]]
* {{l|ja|妖法}} ({{l|ja|ようほう}}, ''[[yōhō]]'')
* {{l|ja|妖道}} ({{l|ja|ようどう}}, ''[[yōdō]]'')
* {{l|ja|妖術師}} ({{l|ja|ようじゅつし}}, ''[[yōjutsushi]]''): a [[witch]], a [[sorcerer]]
{{der-mid}}
* {{l|ja|妖女}} ({{l|ja|ようじょ}}, ''[[yōjo]]''): a [[seductively]] or [[distractingly]] [[beautiful]] woman; a [[vamp]]; a female [[fairy]], a [[siren]]
* {{l|ja|妖星}} ({{l|ja|ようせい}}, ''[[yōsei]]''): an [[inauspicious]] or [[unlucky]] [[star]]
* {{l|ja|妖精}} ({{l|ja|ようせい}}, ''[[yōsei]]''): [[fairy]]
* {{l|ja|妖精症}} ({{l|ja|ようせいしょう}}, ''[[yōseishō]]''): {{sense|medical}} [[leprechaunism]], a manifestation of secondary insulin resistance
* {{l|ja|妖美}} ({{l|ja|ようび}}, ''[[yōbi]]''): [[seductively]] [[beautiful]]
* {{l|ja|妖婦}} ({{l|ja|ようふ}}, ''[[yōfu]]''): a [[seductress]], a [[vamp]]
* {{l|ja|妖変}} ({{l|ja|ようへん}}, ''[[yōhen]]''): a [[strange]] [[accident]], [[emergency]], or [[calamity]]
* {{l|ja|妖魔}} ({{l|ja|ようま}}, ''[[yōma]]''): a [[monster]], a [[demon]]
* {{l|ja|妖冶}} ({{l|ja|ようや}}, ''[[yōya]]''): {{l|ja|妖艶}}, {{l|ja|妖婉}}: [[bewitchingly]] [[attractive]]; [[seductive]]
* {{l|ja|妖厄神}} ({{l|ja|ようやくじん}}, ''[[yōyakujin]]''): a [[god]] of [[disaster]] and [[calamity]]; a god of [[disease]] and [[misfortune]]
* {{l|ja|妖霊}} ({{l|ja|ようれい}}, ''[[yōrei]]''): an [[evil]] [[spirit]]; a [[phantom]]
* {{l|ja|妖霊星}} ({{l|ja|ようれいぼし}}, ''[[yōreiboshi]]''): {{l|ja|妖星}}: an [[inauspicious]] or [[unlucky]] [[star]]
* {{l|ja|妖麗}} ({{l|ja|ようれい}}, ''[[yōrei]]''): {{l|ja|妖美}}: [[seductively]] [[beautiful]]
* {{l|ja|妖化}} ({{l|ja|ようか}}, ''[[yōka]]''): a [[demonic]] [[entity]] or [[transformation]]
